editor.device_disabled: The device of this entity is disabled.
editor.switch_as_x_confirm: This switch will be hidden and a new {domain} will be added. Your existing configurations using the switch will continue to work.
editor.switch_as_x_remove_confirm: This {domain} will be removed and the original switch will be visible again. Your existing configurations using the {domain} will no longer work!

editor.hidden_description: Hidden entities will not be shown on your dashboard or included when indirectly referenced (ie via an area or device). Their history is still tracked and you can still interact with them with services.

reload.title: Quick reload

restart.title: Restart NDX Tech
restart.description: Interrupts all running automations and scripts.
restart.confirm_description: This will interrupt all running automations and scripts.

stop.confirm_description: This will interrupt all running automations and scripts.

reboot.title: Reboot system
reboot.description: Restarts the system running NDX Tech and all add-ons.
reboot.confirm_description: This will reboot the complete system which includes NDX Tech and all the add-ons.

shutdown.title: Isključivanje sustava
shutdown.description: Shuts down the system running NDX Tech and all add-ons.
shutdown.confirm_description: This will shut down the complete system which includes NDX Tech and all add-ons.

restart-safe-mode.title: Restart NDX Tech in safe mode
restart-safe-mode.description: Restarts NDX Tech without loading any custom integrations and frontend modules.

zha_reconfigure_device.heading: Reconfiguring device
zha_reconfigure_device.introduction: Reconfigure a device on your Zigbee network. Use this feature if your device is not functioning correctly.
zha_reconfigure_device.battery_device_warning: You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the reconfiguration process. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
zha_reconfigure_device.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the reconfiguration will continue in the background.
zha_reconfigure_device.in_progress: The device is being reconfigured. This may take some time.
zha_reconfigure_device.configuration_failed: The device reconfiguration failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

services.reconfigure: Ponovno konfiguriaj ZHA uređaj (liječenje uređaja). Upotrijebite ovo ako imate problema s uređajem. Ako je uređaj u pitanju uređaj za bateriju, provjerite je li budan i prihvaća naredbe kada koristite ovu uslugu.
